history.heading: 'Electronic Computer-Aided Design' ('ECAD') “software” designed for the integration of multiple dies into a 'multi-chip' integrated circuit, and having all of the following:
history.title: 'Electronic Computer-Aided Design' ('ECAD') “software” designed for the integration of multiple dies into a 'multi-chip' integrated circuit, and having all of the following:

supplement.heading: Supplement No. 1 to Part 774—The Commerce Control List

breadcrumbs: 3D992 “Software” for the “development” or “production” of commodities specified in 3B001.a.4, c, d, f.1, f.5, k to n, p.2, p.4, r, or 3B002.c and “software” as follows (see List of Items Controlled).
history.text:
'Electronic Computer-Aided Design' ('ECAD') “software” designed for the integration of multiple dies into a 'multi-chip' integrated circuit, and having all of the following:
Floor planning; and
b.1. Floor planning; and
Co-design or co-simulation of die and package.
b.2. Co-design or co-simulation of die and package.
Technical Note: For the purposes of 3D992.b, 'multi-chip' includes multi-die and multi-chiplet.
